summary: While searching for their missing father in the mountains of Alaska, two siblings come across a baby polar bear on the run from a pair of poachers.
cast: Thora Birch|Vincent Kartheiser|Dirk Benedict|Charlton Heston|Duncan Fraser|Gordon Tootoosis|Ben Cardinal|Ryan Kent|Don S. Davis|Dolly Madsen|Stephen E. Miller|Byron Chief-Moon|Kristin Lehman|Adrien Dorval|Ed Gale|Mark McCracken|Agee
title: Alaska, de Fraser C. Heston
